baseMessages.content:
You are a classifier that identifies which of the following real estate attributes are mentioned in the text: 
                        ["totalArea", "complexYear", "numberOfBalconies", "gardenPrice", "hasAttic", "flatYear", "gardenArea", "loggieArea", "isInsulated", "price", "hasBalcony", "garagePrice", "hasParking", "floor", "garageArea", "rooms", "numberOfTerraces", "hasSeparateToilet", "numberOfCellars", "balconyArea", "flatArea", "hasTerrace", "totalFloors", "cellarArea", "hasGarden", "flatModificationYear", "complexModificationYear", "terraceArea", "hasGarage", "parkingPrice", "hasCellar", "hasLoggie", "storey", "numberOfLoggias", "hasElevator", "totalStoreys"].

                        Return only the attribute names that are explicitly or implicitly mentioned.
                        Do not guess. Only return attributes that are clearly present.

The apartment building has undergone reconstruction - insulation of the building + roof, which has significantly affected heating costs, and in 2024, the riser pipes were replaced, new balconies were added, and 2 elevators (passenger and freight) were also replaced . The apartment has new SLOVAKTUAL windows installed - glass in 12/2022 (kitchen, bedroom) and in 8/2024 (living room) . The total space of the apartment is bright and sunny, which enhances the good energy that this property truly possesses. APARTMENT LAYOUT: From the entrance hallway, to the left is the living room measuring 21 m2, which has access to a reconstructed balcony, this room is west-facing, to the right of the entrance hallway is the kitchen, which leads to the second room, which has the same dimensions as the living room, both rooms are east-facing with views of Dubeň and the Little Fatra mountains, directly from the entrance hallway, you can also access the spacious bathroom. Input: WE OFFER FOR SALE A 2-ROOM APARTMENT B7 ON THE 2ND STOREY IN THE CENTER OF ŽILINA IN THE KOLEČKO RESIDENCE PROJECT ABOUT THE PROJECT The Kolečko Residence offers premium living in the absolute center of the city of Žilina. In addition to classic 2-room apartments, spacious 3, 4, and 5-room apartments are also available. The boulevard is just 8 minutes' walk away, along with Marian Square (4 minutes), where residents can find almost anything, completing the concept of ideal urban living. In close proximity to the residential complex, there is a kindergarten, an elementary school, and several high schools. There is also a children's playground and a park at Studničky within 500 meters. This means one thing: a perfect environment for families with children. The price includes complete furnishings of the apartment in a high-standard finish, which the client can choose according to their own preferences. Input: EXCLUSIVELY we offer for sale a reconstructed 1-room apartment with a usable area of 38.6 m2, located in the premium area of the Rajecká Valley. It is located on the first floor of the apartment building, and it includes a balcony with a beautiful view, parking is available directly on the fenced property. The apartment will be handed over in a shell-and-core state with the option to finish to standard specifications. The property is a unique development project Harmony 6 on the border of the town of Rajecké Teplice and the village of Konská, which are popular destinations for seekers of tourist and wellness experiences. The apartment building is a detached structure with 10 apartments, featuring a fenced plot, garages for personal vehicles, parking spaces, areas for social gatherings, a shed for storing sports equipment, and additional common areas in the basement. The surroundings of the apartment building will feature landscaped grassy areas, ornamental shrubs, and plenty of greenery, which will enhance the friendly community atmosphere of living in a property with a smaller number of residential units. The sought-after Spa Aphrodite complex with outdoor and indoor pools is located approximately 7 minutes on foot. The regional city of Žilina is only 11 km away. Recommendation from the real estate agent : by purchasing this apartment, you are investing in health and experiences, as well as taking advantage of a great opportunity to appreciate your financial investment based on rental income. LAYOUT : The windows, whose size ensures pleasant lighting in the apartment, are oriented to the southwest to southeast. The property consists of the following rooms : the living area / 26.43 m2 / consists of a living room modernly connected to the kitchen, with ample space for a relaxation area of the apartment, a bathroom / 5.17 m2 / with space for a sink, shower enclosure, toilet, and electric boiler, an entrance hallway, and a communication hallway / 5.76 m2 / . The exit to the southwest-facing balcony is from the living area of the apartment. TECHNICAL INFORMATION : The offered apartment is located in an insulated building with a Prefa galvanized roof, and the Slovaktual windows are glazed with triple insulating glass . The property is heated by underfloor water heating, with each apartment having its own electric boiler serving as a source of heating and hot water supply. The property is being completed to the shell and core stage, and it can be finished to a standard specification, which additionally includes: floating floors and tiles, bathroom tiles, interior doors and frames, sink, toilet bowl, shower enclosure. Established utility networks: municipal water, municipal sewage, electricity. LOCATION : A huge added value of investing in the purchase of an apartment in the Harmony 6 project is its location. Close to the center of a charming spa town with therapeutic thermal springs, in close proximity to sought-after indoor and outdoor pools as well as a sauna world, and the enchanting nature of the Rajec Valley right outside the windows. The town of Rajecké Teplice and the municipality of Konská offer a diverse range of amenities. Within a few minutes' walk, you will find grocery stores and various shops, restaurants, cafes, ice cream parlors, establishments offering diverse services, a primary school, a kindergarten, a daycare, healthcare facilities, a church, a social services center, and more. The nearby and distant surroundings of the apartment building are the perfect place for long walks, active sports, and children's entertainment. Nearby, there are beautiful spa parks in English and French styles, as well as the enchanting Swan Lake.
